body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Traffic & Travel Tips              Traffic & Travel Tips      As part of the CityArchRiver 2015 project celebrating the 50th anniversary of the Gateway Arch, the Arch grounds and many surrounding streets are currently under construction.Please allow extra time and check the following sources to see the current status of closures:Missouri Department of Transportation's Traveler Information MapLocal St. Louis District MoDOT News Releases              Â     View of the Mississippi River from the top of the Gateway Arch.
title: Jefferson National Expansion Memorial: Traffic & Travel Tips
